category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_result_email_xsl_name
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path to the XSL file used to convert International Material Data System (IMDS) Result XML file into email content sent to the user.
